allDefaultStart.title: Start with defaults
allDefaultStart.description: Only recommended for experienced users.<1></1>Would you like to proceed?

balanced.name: Balanced(Rec)
balanced.description: The character adjusts conversation length<1></1>and occasionally uses and omniscient perspective.<

novel.name: Novel
novel.description: Your short replies get long responses,<1></1>often with an omniscient touch.<

realistic.name: Realistic
realistic.description: It’s like a real conversation,<1></1>hard to know what the character is really thinking.

styleFile.name: Converation style file
styleFile.description: Supports Risu-style prompt templates as well.

dataContent.title: Have any data to load?

options.default: No, I will setup from scratch
options.local: Yes, I will load it from local storage
options.cloud: Yes, I will load it from cloud

dataContent.description: All data, including chat history and settings,<1></1>can be backed up and restored from a file at any time.

languageContent.title: Languages
languageContent.description: Just so you know, continuing doesn't mean you're agreeing to any terms.<1 />All your data stays local.

installContent.title: Install App!
installContent.description: Add YoursAI to your home screen for a smoother experience.<1></1>Download takes just a second!

nameContent.title: All set!<1></1>Lastly, how should we call you?

intro.label: Intro(optional)
intro.placeholder: Things you’d like the character to know about you

yes.label: Yes (Recommended)
yes.description: It shows the character's dialogue<1></1>as if written by a real person - easy to read and realistic.

no.label: No
no.description: It shows the character's lines ASAP.<1></1>Feels a bit robotic, but keeps the conversation flow quick.
